texts.biography: Aker is master of the rune of weakness. It brings out the negativity it hides in each one. There is no force where there is insecurity. And that's where the battle is lost.
texts.name: Aker

specialty.description: Creatures melee attack reduces enemy defense.
specialty.name: Weakness Rune
specialty.tooltip: Creatures melee attack reduces enemy defense. Start with Disrupting Ray.
